message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. After careful consideration, we've decided to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a significant discount. We're confident it will meet and exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I appreciate the introductory price, it's a bit higher than I had in mind. I'd be willing to purchase the product for $750,000.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and would like to make a counterproposal. Considering your interest and feedback, we are willing to offer the product at $800,000. We believe this price reflects the value you see in the product while providing a fair deal for both parties.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $800,000 is closer, but still a little high for my budget. Could we settle at $775,000?

Bob, thank you for your continued interest in our product. We're glad to see that we're getting closer to a mutually beneficial agreement. Based on your latest offer, we propose to set the product price at $790,000. We believe this offers a reasonable compromise between our original asking price and your current offer.
Alice, this is a fair offer and I appreciate the concessions you've made. To be frank, I'm hesitant to go any higher than $780,000. If you can meet me there, I'm ready to close the deal.
